title: Top Places to visit in Siddipet, Telangana
content: Siddipet is a city in Siddipet district of the Indian state of Telangana. It is a municipality and the headquarters of Siddipet District. title: Top Places to visit in Suryapet, Telangana
content: Suryapet is a city and the district headquarters of Suryapet district in the Indian state of Telangana. title: Top Places to visit in Vikarabad, Telangana
content: Vikarabad is a town and mandal in Vikarabad district of the Indian state of Telangana. It is located in Vikarabad mandal of Vikarabad revenue division. title: Nirav Modi said he will kill himself if extradited to India
content:
LONDON: Jailed diamantaire Nirav Modi told a UK court on Wednesday that he was beaten up “three times” in prison and threatened to kill himself if his extradition to India is ordered, but still a UK judge refused to grant him bail.

title: Top Places to visit in Wanaparthy, Telangana
content:
Wanaparthy is a town of Wanaparthy district of Telangana, India. The first polytechnic college (KDR Government Polytechnic) in Telangana started in Wanaparthy.

Top Places to visit in Warangal Rural, Telangana
content:
Warangal Rural district is a district in the Indian state of Telangana. The district headquarters are located at Geesugonda. It was a part of the Warangal district prior to the re-organisation of districts in the state.

title: Top Places to visit in Yadadri Bhuvanagiri, Bhongiri, Telangana
content: Yadadri Bhuvanagiri district is a district in the Indian state of Telangana. The administrative headquarters is located at Bhongir. title: Top Places to visit in Dhalai, Ambassa, Tripura
content:
Dhalai is an administrative district in the state of Tripura in India. The district headquarters are in Ambassa. As of 2011 it was the least populous district of Tripura (out of 8), although it is the largest district in the state.

title: Top Places to visit in Gomati, Udaipur, Tripura
content:
Gomati district is a district of Tripura, India. This district was created in January 2012 when four new districts were created in Tripura, taking the number of districts in the state from four to eight.
Udaipur is its headquarters.

title: Top Places to visit in Khowai, Tripura
content: Khowai district is a district of Tripura state of India.
